trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmPoolMbrAvail)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A pool member is becoming available in global traffic management module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmPoolMbrNotAvail)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A pool member is becoming unavailable in global traffic management module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmPoolMbrDisabled)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A pool member is disabled in global traffic management module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmPoolMbrEnabled)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A pool member is enabled in global traffic management module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emScheduledArchiveFailed)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A scheduled configuration archive failed

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmServerAvail)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A server is becoming available in global traffic management module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmServerNotAvail)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A server is becoming unavailable in global traffic management module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmServerDisabled)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A server is disabled in global traffic management module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmServerEnabled)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A server is enabled in global traffic management module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipServiceDown)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A service is detected DOWN

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipServiceUp)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A service is detected UP

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emASMSigInstallComplete)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: ASM signature has been installed on a managed device

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emASMSigInstallFailed)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: ASM signature installation has failed

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emASMSigUpdateFailed)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: ASM signature update failed

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emASMSigUpdateAvailable)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: ASM signature update is available

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipTrafficGroupActivate)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A traffic group is being activated on the system

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipTrafficGroupDeactivate)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A traffic group is being deactivated on the system

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipTrafficGroupActive)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A traffic group is going into active mode on the system

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipTrafficGroupForcedOffline)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A traffic group is going into forced offline mode on the system

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipTrafficGroupOffline)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A traffic group is going into offline mode on the system

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipTrafficGroupStandby)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A traffic group is going into standby mode on the system

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipVcmpAlertsVcmpHBDetected)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A VCMP guest heartbeat is detected or regained

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipVcmpAlertsVcmpHBLost)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A VCMP guest heartbeat is lost

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipVcmpAlertsVcmpPowerOff)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A VCMP guest is powered off

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipVcmpAlertsVcmpPowerOn)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A VCMP guest is powered on from a suspended or powered off state

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipLtmVsAvail)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A virtual has become available

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipLtmVsDisabled)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A virtual has become disabled

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipLtmVsEnabled)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A virtual has become enabled

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipLtmVsUnavail)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A virtual has become unavailable

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipVirtualRate)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A virtual has exceeded the allowed rate

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmVsAvail)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A virtual server is becoming available in global traffic management module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmVsNotAvail)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A virtual server is becoming unavailable in global traffic management module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmVsDisabled)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A virtual server is disabled in global traffic management module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmVsEnabled)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A virtual server is enabled in global traffic management module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipAvrAlertsMetricSnmp)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: AVR alert metric state changed
trigger.description: Notification for SNMP

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmWideIpAvail)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A wide IP is becoming available in global traffic management module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmWideIpNotAvail)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A wide IP is becoming unavailable in global traffic management module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmWideIpDisabled)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A wide IP is disabled in global traffic management module.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmWideIpEnabled)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: A wide IP is enabled in global traffic management module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmBig3dSslCertExpired)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: BIG-IP GTM BIG3D SSL Cert has expired

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmBig3dSslCertWillExpire)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: BIG-IP GTM BIG3D SSL Cert will expire

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmJoinedGroup)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: BIG-IP GTM joined sync group

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmLeftGroup)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: BIG-IP GTM left sync group

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmSslCertExpired)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: BIG-IP GTM SSL Cert has expired

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmSslCertWillExpire)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: BIG-IP GTM SSL Cert will expire

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmp.agent[F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB::sysCmFailoverStatusId.0].nodata(5m)}=1
trigger.name: BIG-IP is unreachable via SNMP for 5 minutes

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipLibhalSensorAlarmCritical)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Blade hardware sensor indicated critical alarm

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipLibhalBladePoweredOff)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Blade is about to be powered off

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipBladeTempHigh)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Blade temperature is too high

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipAsmBruteForceAttackDetected)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Brute force attack detected by Application Security Module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipChassisFanBad)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Chassis fan status is bad

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipChmandAlertFanTrayBad)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Chassis fan tray is bad or removed

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipChassisPowerSupplyBad)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Chassis power supply status is bad

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipChassisTempHigh)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Chassis temperature is too high

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmp.agent[F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB::sysCmFailoverStatusId.0].last()}<3
trigger.name: Cluster node is not online: {ITEM.VALUE}

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmp.agent[F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB::sysCmSyncStatusId.0].last()}<>3 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmp.agent[F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB::sysCmSyncStatusId.0].last()}<>6
trigger.name: Cluster not in sync: {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger.description: Fires when sync status is not 'In sync' and is not 'Standalone'

trigger.expression: {Template OS Linux:kernel.maxfiles.last(0)}<1024
trigger.name: Configured max number of opened files is too low on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Linux:kernel.maxproc.last(0)}<256
trigger.name: Configured max number of processes is too low on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipCpuFanSpeedLow)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: CPU fan speed is too low

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipCpuFanSpeedBad)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: CPU fan speed signal not received

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipCpuTempHigh)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: CPU temperature is too high

trigger.expression: {WS-SECGATE-3600:cpuLoad.avg(5m)}>80
trigger.name: CPU占用率过高，5分钟平均值大于80%

trigger.expression: {WS-SECGATE-3600:hdLoad.avg(5m)}>80
trigger.name: CPU占用率过高，5分钟平均值大于80%

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipSystemCheckAlertCurrentHigh)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Current is too high

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipSystemCheckAlertCurrentLow)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Current is too low

trigger.expression: {DBforBIX.Oracle:oracle.dbsize.min(5m)}>{$DB_SIZE_HIGH_LIMIT}*{DBforBIX.Oracle:oracle.dbfilesize.last()}
trigger.name: DB size is near its file size: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}>{$DB_SIZE_HIGH_LIMIT}*{ITEM.LASTVALUE2} on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template Net Brocade FC SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.diff()}=1 and {Template Net Brocade FC SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Device has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Device serial number has changed. Ack to close

trigger.expression: {Template Server HP iLO SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.diff()}=1 and {Template Server HP iLO SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Device has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Device serial number has changed. Ack to close

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emServiceContractExpiry)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Device service contract will expire soon

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipRaidDiskFailure)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Disk failure in a RAID disk array

trigger.expression: {Template OS AIX:system.stat[cpu,wa].avg(5m)}>20
trigger.name: Disk I/O is overloaded on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: OS spends significant time waiting for I/O (input/output) operations. It could be indicator of performance issues with storage system.

trigger.expression: {Template OS Linux:system.cpu.util[,iowait].avg(5m)}>40
trigger.name: Disk I/O is overloaded on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: OS spends significant time waiting for I/O (input/output) operations. It could be indicator of performance issues with storage system.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipLibhalDiskBayRemoved)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Disk sled was removed from a bay

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmKeyGenerationExpiration)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: DNSSEC Key generation has expired

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmKeyGenerationRollover)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: DNSSEC Key generation has rolled over

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipAsmDosAttackDetected)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: DoS attack detected by Application Security Module

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emHaSyncFailed)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: EM HA Sync has failed

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipFipsDeviceError)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Encountered error in the FIPS card operation

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmp.agent[F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB::sysCmFailoverStatusId.0].diff()}=1
trigger.name: Failover status changed to: {ITEM.VALUE}

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipSystemCheckAlertFanSpeedLow)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Fan speed is too low

trigger.expression: {Template Net Brocade FC SNMPv2:system.hw.firmware.diff()}=1 and {Template Net Brocade FC SNMPv2:system.hw.firmware.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Firmware has changed
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Firmware version has changed. Ack to close

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emGatherServiceContractFailure)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Gathering service contract end date failed

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmp.agent[F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB::sysGlobalHostCpuUsageRatio1m.0].min(5m)}>{$CPU_WARN}
trigger.name: High CPU load

trigger.expression: {Template Net Brocade FC SNMPv2:system.cpu.util[swCpuUsage.0].avg(5m)}>{$CPU_UTIL_MAX}
trigger.name: High CPU utilization
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}.

trigger.expression: {Template Net Brocade FC SNMPv2:vm.memory.pused[swMemUsage.0].avg(5m)}>{$MEMORY_UTIL_MAX}
trigger.name: High memory utilization
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}.

trigger.expression: {Template OS AIX:system.uname.diff(0)}>0
trigger.name: Host information was changed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Linux:system.uname.diff(0)}>0
trigger.name: Host information was changed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS AIX:system.hostname.diff(0)}>0
trigger.name: Hostname was changed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Linux:system.hostname.diff(0)}>0
trigger.name: Hostname was changed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipStandByFail)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: In failover condition, this standby will not be able to go active

trigger.expression: {Template OS AIX:vm.memory.size[available].last(0)}<20M
trigger.name: Lack of available memory on server {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Linux:vm.memory.size[available].last(0)}<20M
trigger.name: Lack of available memory on server {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Linux:system.swap.size[,pfree].last(0)}<50
trigger.name: Lack of free swap space on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: It probably means that the systems requires more physical memory.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipSystemCheckAlertMilliVoltageHigh)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Milli-Voltage is too high

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipSystemCheckAlertMilliVoltageLow)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Milli-Voltage is too low

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emStatsCollectionRateCap)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Performance-monitoring data collection rate exceeds recommended limit

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emPerformanceStorageDays)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Performance storage capacity is about to fall below configured number of days

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emPerformanceStorageCap)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Performance storage capacity is lower than the amount of space reserved

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipSystemCheckAlertPowerHigh)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Power is too high

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipSystemCheckAlertPowerLow)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Power is too low

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipPsPowerOff)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Power supply unit has powered off

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipPsPowerOn)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Power supply unit has powered on

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipPsAbsent)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Power supply unit is absent

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmProberPoolDisabled)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Prober Pool Disabled

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmProberPoolEnabled)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Prober Pool Enabled

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmProberPoolMbrDisabled)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Prober Pool Member Disabled

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmProberPoolMbrEnabled)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Prober Pool Member Enabled

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmProberPoolMbrStatusChange)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Prober Pool Member Status Change

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmProberPoolMbrStatusChangeReason)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Prober Pool Member Status Change Reason

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmProberPoolStatusChange)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Prober Pool Status Change

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmProberPoolStatusChangeReason)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Prober Pool Status Change Reason

trigger.expression: {Template OS AIX:system.cpu.load[percpu,avg1].avg(5m)}>5
trigger.name: Processor load is too high on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Linux:system.cpu.load[percpu,avg1].avg(5m)}>5
trigger.name: Processor load is too high on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emSchedBackupFailed)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Scheduled performance data backup has failed

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emSoftwareInstallComplete)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Software installation has completed

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emSoftwareInstallFailed)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Software installation has failed

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmp.agent[F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB::sysProductVersion.0].diff()}=1 or {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmp.agent[F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB::sysProductBuild.0].diff()}=1 or {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmp.agent[F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB::sysProductEdition.0].diff()}=1
trigger.name: Software was changed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipSsdMwiReachedThreshold)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: SSD disk wear-out indicator has reached its threshold

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipSsdMwiNearThreshold)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: SSD disk wear-out indicator is near its threshold

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipLibhalSsdLogicalDiskRemoved)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: SSD logical disk was removed

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipLibhalSsdPhysicalDiskRemoved)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: SSD physical disk was removed

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emStatsDBConnectivityLost)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Statistics database connectivity is lost

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emStatsDBConnectivityRestored)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Statistics database connectivity is restored

trigger.expression: {Template Net Brocade FC SNMPv2:system.status[swOperStatus.0].last(0)}={$HEALTH_CRIT_STATUS}
trigger.name: System status is in critical state
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for errors

trigger.expression: {Template Server HP iLO SNMPv2:system.status[cpqSiMibCondition.0].count(#1,{$HEALTH_CRIT_STATUS},eq)}=1
trigger.name: System status is in critical state
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for errors

trigger.expression: {Template Net Brocade FC SNMPv2:system.status[swOperStatus.0].last(0)}={$HEALTH_WARN_STATUS:"offline"} or {Template Net Brocade FC SNMPv2:system.status[swOperStatus.0].last(0)}={$HEALTH_WARN_STATUS:"testing"}
trigger.name: System status is in warning state
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for warnings

dependency.name: System status is in critical state

trigger.expression: {Template Server HP iLO SNMPv2:system.status[cpqSiMibCondition.0].count(#1,{$HEALTH_WARN_STATUS},eq)}=1
trigger.name: System status is in warning state
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for warnings

dependency.name: System status is in critical state

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipSystemCheckAlertTempHigh)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Temperature is too high

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipAgentRestart)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The agent has been restarted

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipAgentStart)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The agent has started running

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipAgentShutdown)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The agent is in the process of being shut down

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipAggrReaperStateChange)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The aggressive reaper state changed
trigger.description: Aggressive reaper state changes indicate the system is moving into distress-mode for DOS prevention.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipClusterdNoResponse)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The cluster daemon failed to respond for 10 or more seconds

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipCompLimitExceeded)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The compression license limit is exceeded

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emCpuUsage)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The cpu is exceeding configured usage limits

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipDiskPartitionGrowth)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The disk partition exceeds the specified growth limit
trigger.description: By default, the limit is set to 5% of the total disk space. The growth is difference of two consecutive monitoring data.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipDiskPartitionWarn)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The disk partition free space is very limited
trigger.description: Which isless than a specified limit. By default, the limit is set to 30% of total disk space.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipUnsolicitedRepliesExceededThreshold)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The DNS cache object received unsolicited query replies exceeding a configured threshold

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipDnsRequestRateLimiterEngaged)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The DNS Services request rate limiter has been engaged

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipAsmFtpRequestViolation)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The FTP request issued a violation to the current active policy
trigger.description: This violation is marked as an alerting violation in that policy in Application Security Module.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipAsmFtpRequestBlocked)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The FTP request was blocked
trigger.description: Because it issued (at least one) violation(s) which is marked as blocking at the current active policy in Application Security Module.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipGtmRequestRateLimiterEngaged)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The GTM request rate limiter has been engaged

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipAsmRequestViolation)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The HTTP request issued a violation to the current active policy
trigger.description: This violation is marked as an alerting violation in that policy in Application Security Module.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipAsmRequestBlocked)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The HTTP request was blocked
trigger.description: Because it issued (at least one) violation(s) which is marked as blocking at the current active policy in Application Security Module.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipLicenseExpired)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The license has expired

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipLicenseFailed)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The license validation failed

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipAuthFailed)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The login/sshd authentication has failed

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipPacketRejected)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The packets are rejected

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipClusterPrimaryChanged)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The primary blade has been changed in the cluster system

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipUpdatePriority)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: There is a high priority software update available

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipARPConflict)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: There is an ARP conflict

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipUpdateError)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: There was an error checking for updates

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipAsmSmtpRequestViolation)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The SMTP request issued a violation to the current active policy
trigger.description: This violation is marked as an alerting violation in that policy in Application Security Module.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipAsmSmtpRequestBlocked)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The SMTP request was blocked
trigger.description: Because it issued (at least one) violation(s) which is marked as blocking at the current active policy in Application Security Module.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipSslLimitExceeded)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The SSL license limits are exceeded
trigger.description: Either for TPS (Transactions Per Second) or for MPS (Megabits Per Second).

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipLogErr)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The system has some error conditions

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipLogWarning)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The system is experiencing some warning conditions

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipActiveActive)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The system is going into active-active mode

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipActive)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The system is going into active mode

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipStandby)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The system is going into standby mode

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipLogCrit)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The system is in a critical condition

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipLogEmerg)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The system is in an unusable situation

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipSystemShutdown)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The system is shutting down

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emMemoryUsage)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The system memory is exceeding configured usage limits

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emRaidDriveFailureDetected)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The system RAID drive failure has been detected

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emRaidDriveRebuildComplete)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The system RAID drive rebuild is complete

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipInetPortExhaustion)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: The TMM has run out of source ports and cannot open new communications channels with other machines

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},emPerformanceThreshold)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Threshold has been violated for a performance-data object

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipTamdAlert)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Too many authentication failures (> 60) in 1 second to TMM (Traffic Management Module)

trigger.expression: {Template OS AIX:proc.num[].avg(5m)}>300
trigger.name: Too many processes on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Linux:proc.num[].avg(5m)}>300
trigger.name: Too many processes on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS AIX:proc.num[,,run].avg(5m)}>30
trigger.name: Too many processes running on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Linux:proc.num[,,run].avg(5m)}>30
trigger.name: Too many processes running on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipUpdateServer)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Unable to connect to the F5 Update Check server

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipSystemCheckAlertVoltageHigh)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Voltage is too high

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].count({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC},bigipSystemCheckAlertVoltageLow)}<>0 and {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmptrap[F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB].nodata({$TRIGGER_TIMEOUT_ADC})}=0
trigger.name: Voltage is too low

trigger.expression: {Template OS AIX:system.uptime.change(0)}<0
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} has just been restarted

trigger.expression: {Template OS Linux:system.uptime.change(0)}<0
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} has just been restarted

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP f5 BIG-IP ADC:snmp.agent[F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB::sysSystemUptime.0].change()}<0
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} has just been restarted

trigger.expression: {USG-FW-4000EP:currentConnections.avg(5)}>4000
trigger.name: 会话连接数过高，5分钟平均值大于4000

trigger.expression: {WS-SECGATE-3600:currentConnections.avg(5m)}>4000
trigger.name: 会话连接数过高，5分钟平均值大于4000

trigger.expression: {USG-FW-4000EP:memLoad.avg(15m)}>80
trigger.name: 内存占用率过高，15分钟平均值大于80%

trigger.expression: {WS-SECGATE-3600:memLoad.avg(15m)}>80
trigger.name: 内存占用率过高，15分钟平均值大于80%
